data.name: Rob & Run
data.detailed_description:
Rob & Run is an action shooter in which you need to inflict as much damage as possible to the PHOENIX Corporation, which has seized power in the city. Use different weapons, abilities and gadgets against your enemies.

  • Limited time: Don't waste your time, think over your every step for the fastest possible passage.

  • CHAOS: The more damage you do to the corporation, the more the environment changes.

  • Enemies: The more time passes, the stronger and more aggressive your enemies become, be careful.

  • Weapons: There are many unique weapons in your arsenal, combine them to achieve maximum efficiency.

data.short_description: Rob & Run is an action shooter in which you need to inflict as much damage as possible to the PHOENIX Corporation, which has seized power in the city. Use different weapons, abilities and gadgets against your enemies.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, Russian, Italian, Arabic, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Romanian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel core i3 2120
  • Graphics: RX 550 / GTX 650ti
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel core i5 7400 / Ryzen 3 1400
  • Graphics: GTX 1050ti / RX 570
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
